mapper.select: select s.*,p.name as patientname from seek s left join patient p on s.patientid=p.id
select * from seek where patientid=#{patientid} order by id desc limit 0,1
mapper.insert: insert into seek (patientid, describes, illname, drugs, options, days, price) values (#{patientid},#{describes},#{illname},#{drugs},#{options},#{days},#{price})
